data.title: NJ Orthopaedic Associates
data.meta_description: Dr. Gatt is board certified in orthopaedic surgery. He obtained his medical degree from UMDNJ Rutgers Medical School, New Brunswick after earning his undergraduate degree from Lafayette College. He completed an internship and his residency at Rutgers Robert Wood Johnson Medical School, New Brunswick. Following...
